WorkItem.ClosedComment:
See Change Set #25334. Comment copied below:

You asked for it, and I'm listening! Here's a quick changeset to reflect some feature requests.

Add TouchlessLib Camera functionality to RotateFlip the incoming images.
Add TouchlessDemo Camera Tab check boxes to flip x/y.
TouchlessDemo Markers Tab now automatically selects added markers.

*Please note that documentation updates may take some time after code updates.*
*Expect documentation to reflect the state of the latest release package, not necessarily the latest repository files.*
WorkItem.Description: When a marker is added instead of the drop down saying edit a marker change the drop down to the most recently created marker.
WorkItem.Summary: Touchless Demo: When a marker is added default the drop down to it
